prompt: I have never done programming in my life. Can I take this course?
response: Yes, our courses at appclick are perfect for anyone who has no tech experience and wants to build a career in the IT industry or just wants to perform better in your current job or business using tech.

Till now 500+ learners have benefitted from the quality of our courses. You can check the review section on google and facebook to hear what people are saying about us. Also a lot of our alumni are on linkedin, you can check their LinkedIn profiles so that you can connect with them and ask directly.

prompt: Is there any prerequisite for taking the course ?
response: Our courses is specifically designed for beginners with no prior experience in this field. The only prerequisite is that you need to have a functional laptop with at least 4GB ram, an internet connection, and a thrill to learn data analysis.

prompt:
What datasets are used in this bootcamp? Is it some toy datasets or
 something that mimics a real-world business problem?
response: The datasets used in this bootcamp are crafted from scratch to mimic the real business world by consolidating our years of experience. The datasets not just contain more than a million rows but also cover multiple facets of the business.

prompt:
I'm not sure if this course is good enough for me to invest some 
money. What can I do?
response: We got you covered. We always organize monthly bootcamps to help beginners clear doubts about any of the technologies they want to learn. If you enjoy the bootcamp, taking the course would be a perfect extension.

prompt: How can I contact the instructors for any doubts/support?
response: We have created and recorded every lecture with a motive to explain everything in an easy-to-understand manner. While working on these lectures you could make mistakes in steps or have some doubts. We organize a weekly question and answer session for our online students to interact with the tutors. You need to commit yourself to hold patience, make efforts & diagnose the errors yourself by googling in order to become truly job ready. For any questions, that Google cannot answer or if you hit a wall - we got you covered! You can join our active discord community. which is a dedicated platform to discuss & clear your doubts with fellow learners & mentors.

prompt: What if I dont like this course?
response: As promised we will give you a 100% refund based on the guidelines (Please refer to our course refund policy before enrolling).

prompt: Does this course have lifetime access?
response: Yes

prompt: What is the duration of this course? How long will it last?
response: You can complete all courses in 3-6 months. Classes are 2-3 a week and each session is two hours.

prompt: Can I start this traiining while working full time?
response: Yes. We operate a very light and flexible timetable

prompt: Do you provide any job assistance?
response: Yes, We help you with building portfolio, CV and interview preparation along with that we help you in building online credibility, and based on requirements we refer candidates to potential recruiters.

Yes, Upon successful completion of a course, you will receive a certificate that validates your skills and knowledge in the specific area of study. Our certificates are recognized in the industry and can enhance your professional profile when applying for jobs or seeking career advancement.
